Devs are highly biased towards survivor section of their player base. Would be a fantastic game, otherwise, but until they learn they won't have a game if they don't keep killers playing, their game is going to fail.
Recomendo muito, jogo muito bom e interessante, eu recomendaria apenas nerfar um pouco os killers pois dificulta a vitoria, mas ainda assim muito bom a experiencia do jogo

This is a pretty good horror game and i recommend this game if you are a fan of horror. The matchmaking is sorta off but it is still good. I really want to see Nemesis from resident evil that would be really cool!

It's good! Easy to learn, difficult to master. Even without all the DLC there's plenty to do and enough variety to keep things fresh, despite each round having the same objectives.

Fun mind game, simple foundation but with perks from each character tonnes of different play styles are possible.
good game 10/10 love being dead 5 min into the game :)
I really dont feel like writting so hi

Hmm where do I start? Dead by dedicated servers is a really fun game butttt, with some major flaws. One, ebony momento mori's, i don't know who at bhvr thought it was a good idea to give killers an offering where they can kill everyone off of first hook making it to where everyone in the lobby will most likely depip. What they should do with the mori's is make it where they can only kill you off of second hook. Two, vpn killers/killers on high ping, vpn killers/high ping killers are almost unbearable to go against, they are able to do crazy things like hit you through pallets or from extremely far distances its honestly insane. Three, the servers, the servers themselves are not the best. Some things that should not hit take huntress for example shes able to throw hatchets, and some of them can land next to you and hit, and sometimes ones that land right on someone do nothing. Dedicated servers almost make the perk "dead hard" useless because it doesn't work half of the time. Four, face campers/tunnelers, to be fair bhvr has done a lot to help with these type of people but they are still prominent and annoying. The perk "decisive strike" was kind of made to counter tunneling but a lot of the time you'll be able to run the killer until it runs out. one thing they could do is make it to where ds only last 40 seconds but, it doesnt run out if youre getting chased off of a hook making it to where ds is an anti tunnel perk. Five iri heads, this is an offering for the huntress that makes her hatchets an instant down. i fell like the best way to fix them is to get rid of them entirely or make it to where you have to hit a hatchet from a certain distance for it to instant down. Their are a fair amount of things I didnt list. Dont let this review sway you away from buying the game, yes its lowkey a mess but the developers are passionate and the game can be a ton of fun.
I love when I play the game and get face camped by a killer that can't chase people and keep track of people its what makes this game a blast! After you get to higher ranks though this never happens.
Ã“timo jogo para se jogar no online com ou sem amigos
pretty hood but takes long to get in a game

Nice horror, survival, and hunter game. A complete masterpiece that never gets old nor boring. Almost perfect, I only think the hillbilly's chainsaw movement should be a little more responsive to the mouse instead of moving only with the camera. 9.9/10
shit game removing all the fun stuff

YO soy un jugador mas novato apenas llevo 70 horas. Pero creo que el juego tiene un planteamiento  divertidisimo. Lo cierto es que si ere survivor puedes encontrar de todo , desde grandes jugadores honorables que te ayudan y sobrevives y otros que tiran del cable con la primera colleja. El problema es cuando eres Killer ya que existen muchos jugadores que no se toman a bien perder y te insultan y te reportan por ganar. Lo peor de esto que el sistema del juego tiene de reportes te elimina el juego de la cuenta para siempre. Esto quiere decir que por jugar lo mismo 2 partidas con 4 amigos distintos y todos te reporten por ganarles te quedas sin juego. Esto sumado a una comunidad de survivor muy toxica (tambien los hay killer pero sin mas irrelevantes) producen perdidas injustas de juegos a propietarios de estos.
Espero que esto se arregle.

Was ich auch gut finde ist das die Ãœberlebenden sie sich nicht mit Waffen oder mit schlagen wehren kÃ¶nnen sondern nur mit einer Taschenlampe wehren kÃ¶nnen , also ist ein tolles versteck spiel vor dem Killer =) .
Game is fun especially with friends, if you don't mind stupid abusable hitboxes.
It is fun to play with friends, but you can't be the killer and play with your friends at the same time.

I don't recommand this game for player like me.
Since explaining who i am (and no one care anyway) would be long, i will just told you the key point you have to think before buying this game.


- Playing as a monster is frustrating, stressful and hard. The game is about a hunter trying to kill 4 survivor, so why playing survivor is chill and playing hunter is stressful ?

- If you like e-sport/fair game, this isn't for you. Game can be so easy as survivor (playing with friend + vocal, using cheated item/perk)  or easy as hunter (cheated perk + playing vs solo + 1000 hours played)
So yes you have understand, every game are different in term of chance to win.

- NO MATCHMAKING. It say it all, since there is no matchmaking, no ranked system or any of that, game will look like => 50% of time easy win, 35% of time lose whatever you could do, 15% of time your skill make the difference

- Cancerous community. Well it's hard to find a game without that, but in this one, it's a permanent trash talk survivor vs hunter.
